website_summaries.verdict: Considering all this versatile jacket has to offer, you will find it's a good deal and practical to wear while engaging in activities on and off the wintry slopes.
pros: Structured to move with your body, so it's ideal for activities like snowboarding
3-in-1 design — outer shell and inner fleece jacket can be worn individually or together
cons: Fit tends to be snug, so you may have to order up in size
Some consumers may not find it warm enough to wear in extremely cold temperatures

customer_reviews.title: High quality, warm, used for skiiing/snowmobiling
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this coat. The warm pink/red color was bright and attractive. Zipper pockets on each side and one at the chest - big enough to hold cash, cards, lip balm. There were additional side pockets in the underlayer fleece (which is detachable, but I always kept it attached to the shell layer). The two layers zip together so it feels like a single piece, but you can access the under-pockets easily. I wore this for skiing and snowmobiling in -5 to 20F. I wore a silk base layer and a second Dri-fit top underneath and was always warm. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: The sizes run just slightly smaller than average, but the seller was extremely helpful in advising me to get a size that fits perfectly for my needs! I usually wear an S, but ordered a M after the seller suggested it to give me extra layering room under the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great Versatility
customer_reviews.text: The Camel Crown 3-in-1 jacket is warm, waterproof and comfortable. I wore the jacket while rock climbing on a cold day with a mix of wind and a little snow. I am happy to say I stayed warm and dry all day! The fleece was perfect while climbing and I added the shell when it started to snow and the wind picked up. The quality of the jacket is great and fits me very well. I highly recommend it for the versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Adventurous

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jacket for an upcoming trip where I expect to need waterproof outerwear yet something warmer, at times. This jacket fits the bill perfectly. The fleece lining is easily removable. With the lining, I've found the jacket is warm enough for most Minnesota winter days when I'm out walking with my dog and while I haven't yet tested it outside, the rain jacket alone seems like it will do nicely. The jacket fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Warm and dry!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket worked perfect in Iceland where it rains a lot! It kept me very warm and dry. I loved it. Color is great for photos too! I bought the pink. Love this jacket, not real heavy it bulky either. The zip out lining is excellent as a single fleece too.
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Great multipurpose jacket! Size up though...
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! It’s amazingly warm with the fleece zipped in. I just completed several hours of hiking through a misty rain and stayed very dry. All zippers are designed to keep rain out. Pockets are decent size and can hold phone and other essentials securely. Hood has multiple adjustments and a small bill, although I’ll add a ball cap to keep rain off my glasses. I’m 5’ 2”, 125 lbs. and sized up to a medium. I’m glad I did so I can layer and use this jacket year ‘round. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Gremling

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile great quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality the interior fleece shell can be removed and worn separately or zips in. Shell has descrete loops on each arm and at the neck. The outer waterproof shell has loop with snaps on inside of sleeves and at neck. Is waterproof the detachable hood zips on and tucks under flap at shoulders and velcros in place. Took awhile to figure out how to use the adjustable pulls on the hood to keep the hat far enough back off my forehead
customer_reviews.author: Janice Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to wear this in the snow. The inner fleece and the outer jacket are very well joined. Not clumsy at all. Feels warm too. I love it already
customer_reviews.author: Aderinsola

customer_reviews.title: Love,love,love
customer_reviews.text: Loved this jacket went to Niagara falls in October. It's definitely water proof. Keeps you warm even with out the fleece. The fleece is amazing for when it's getting very cold. I am in love with my jacket best investment for travelers who aren't sure how cold it will be or if it's going to rain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good with one Exception
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as an inexpensive alternative to the North Face triclimate coat. It is a good value and recommend due to price. However unlike the North Face, the fasteners that hold the fleece in place or a bit clumsy and take longer to fasten than the North Face. The fasteners are also not as good of quality so it’s possible that they will eventually break. Overall not bad for the price and about half the price of a North Face.
customer_reviews.author: BamaFever72

customer_reviews.title: No duster/elastic on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Nice thickness and feels like good weighted material but no duster or elastic at the bottom so I returned it. It actually gets wider at the bottom where I like a more fitted jacket to avoid getting snow in it if I fall skiing. Also, based on others' r ed views, I ordered a large but should have gotten a small or medium. It was definitely large on me, oversized. I'm 5'7", 155 lbs, 36DDD.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: I just received my coat a couple days ago. I tried it out today at my nephew's baseball game. It kept me warm the entire time! It will be perfect for the winter season in Chicago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Thought ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a cute jacket. It fit all the criteria I was looking for. So ... I checked the size chart,and i ordered my plus size jacket. Never again will that happen. There was no way my plus size jacket can fit my teenage average sized 8 american teen who is tall to boot,but it did with the exception of the hips. I would take pictures and upload them of the ridicules sizing,but for what. If your company is not gonna make plus size truly plus then dont advertise that you do. Not happy, Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: You can pay 300 for The North Face, or can can save your hard earned cash and get this one. The difference in quality is marginal, this is one heck of a value.
customer_reviews.author: Gero nimo Vega

customer_reviews.title: Two Jackets in one..
customer_reviews.text: Many Ski-Jackets tend to be too bulky.. this one has two elements (an inner fleece jacket and an outer waterproof shell).. That we can separate. The fit is quite good though I will say the sizes run a little smaller than the proposed measurements would indicate so plan accordingly. (The Chart said a Medium would be fine for me and a Large for my Husband, but we had to trade up to a Large and Extra Large for us respectively).
customer_reviews.author: M Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wind proof
customer_reviews.text: I got an xl, I'm 5'6" 180 I have pretty large upper arms. In the xl I was still able to wear a hoodie underneath. This is a good jacket for the price. Wind resistant and waterproof. The inside fleece is super warm on its own. The hood is oversized which in my opinion I like because it allows for a winter hat underneath. The outer layer is pretty noisy when walking, aside from that it's a good jacket that kept me warm during winter nights with and w/o a hoodie underneath. I also like how discrete the logo is and how comfortable overall the jacket is.
customer_reviews.author: Tsunami_T

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! By itself, the inner fleece is comfy and bright. I often wear it all day because our office is cold where I work. I've tested the full coat now in cold weather and it does it's job. I stay warm and dry. The color on the "pink" is more of a neon coral kind of pink. Not what I expected from the pictures but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Very poor quality. Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love this jacket, but unfortunately after just less than a month the zipper ( like other reviews) gets stuck all the time!! So what is the point in even wearing it if I can barely get it zipped up and down! I think everything else was made great except the entire zipper quality. It does run small so I ordered a size up thankfully. I'm so sad to say that I will be returning this due to the poor zipper quality and not being able to use it. Makes me sad cause the red coral color is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Hager

customer_reviews.title: Decent coat for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the warmth and the flexibility to use pieces together or separate. The windbreaker was more breathable than I needed; I wish that it kept more of the wind out. Isn’t an issue when both pieces are used together.
customer_reviews.author: Pam H.

customer_reviews.title: I think it is chinese sizing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL so that I would have room in the shoulders but it was too small and tight in the shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Jacket lasts longer than skiing career
customer_reviews.text: So... I can check skiing off my bucket list. I wouldn’t really call it skiing as much as I would call it falling down repeatedly in ways that should have broken bones. Somehow I miraculously came out sore, bruised, but otherwise healthy. On a positive note, this jacket kept me warm and dry. Believe me, I fell down enough to have tested this jacket to its core. Maybe wish I would have gone up one size because I didn’t take all the layers of ski garb into consideration but the size I got will be great for everyday use. The inside zip pockets were awesome features. All the pockets zip btw. I love the jacket but I hate skiing.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Complicated and flimsy zipper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for my daughter. The plus side it was definitely waterproof material, which is what I was looking for. The jacket itself seemed like good quality. The issue was it had a double zipper stop. Which meant for some reason you had zip and unzip through 2 stops. My daughter has fine motor issues and she struggled to zip and unzip the jacket. On top of the confusing zipper stops ( so no functionality of the double stop) the zipper was very cheap plastic and I could see right away that she if she struggled with it she was most certainly going to break it.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly7

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase in years!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect coat for all seasons. It’s a perfect 3in1! The fleece is incredibly soft and both outer layers zip in perfectly. It comes as the full coat and you can change it as you need. I ordered the small and was worried it would be too big; but it’s perfect. Also, it’ll be great for outdoors in winter and for the office! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Andy Stepchinski

customer_reviews.title: Not great for below freezing, but it keeps.you dry.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent jacket. I live in the PNW and the rainy, cold season is upon us. I walk every day and it did well at keeping the rain off me and pretty good at blocking the wind. I dress in layers, thankfully. I would not feel warm enough without an extra hoodie underneath in temps below 25 -30 F. Around 45 - 50 and sunny it does get pretty warm, I'll probably remove the liner when Spring hits. Overall, it does what I need it to do for now. I'll probably find something a bit warmer for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: I will purchase the brand again.
customer_reviews.text: Great winter/rain coat. Runs a little small. Fleece inside keeps you very worn. I am happy with my purchase. In love with the color.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket I had bought it first for my bf for his fishing mornings then I bought myself one just because I wanted a warm jacket I love it went to the snow kept me so warm to a point that I even took it off cause I got hot. The best thing is that it’s 2-1 and you can take it apart easily. Definitely recommend buying this item
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: This kept me warm in temperatures around 35 to 45 F in Italy and France. The inside fleece liner has pockets on both sides which I like. Zipper goes way up under the chain you can really keep yourself protected from the cold. I run warm so maybe some people wouldn't find this warm enough but it was for me. My only complaint is when I was putting my arms through the sleeves The fleece liner really and moved a lot and I just felt a little wrinkled in my sleeves but it eventually worked itself out.
customer_reviews.author: zenner

customer_reviews.title: Love the coat -- HATE the hood
customer_reviews.text: the coat is comfortable and warm. the hood is completely pointless. the hood is attached by a 5-6 inch zipper (not even the entire width of the hood) and is very flimsy (no lining). luckily it's detachable so i will be buying a cute hat to wear with the coat instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: STOP, the search is over!!!! Love the jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. I wear both together and separate. It is so easy to separate the shell from the fleece. I can do it while wearing them both. Very warm either way. Absolutely love all of the pockets. I have had it now for over 6 months and I have washed them multiple times and no fading, rips or tears. If your on the fence you will not regret buying this product. I had been looking for a heavy jacket for so long and I am very picky. I searched and read reviews of them all. Decided on the Camel Crown and I'm happy I did. The search is over.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Its warm perfect size. Lovely color. Definitely recommend it. Fall and rain so far so good. Next season is winter so I can find out if its good for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kurtzweil

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this coat
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect jacket for skiing. The multi-layer feature allows you to easily remove a layer without having the extra bulk of wearing multiple items is clothing in case you get too warm or too cold throughout the day. It comes apart and can be put together easily and I love that I can use it for so many activities. I'm most excited about the fleece zip up. It's very cozy and not at all bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Fashion Talk

customer_reviews.title: Warm but details are not great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a ski trip. Second time I put it on, there was a hole in the left hip pocket and one of the sleeve loops for the inner liner ripped out. The next day, the other sleeve liner loop also ripped out. Just not great quality but definitely warm.
customer_reviews.author: A DeVille

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS JACKET
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about it. The upper arms on the outer shell are a bit small - otherwise PERFECT. I'm thinking of getting another.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Get one size up.
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to Iceland soon, and wanted a warm coat. It has lots of pockets for passport, money, and credit card (and cash)I found this to be 1 size smaller than my usual size. I wear medium, got large, but I’m going to be wearing lots of layers.
customer_reviews.author: flowerchild

customer_reviews.title: Sizing seemed inconsistent and off.
customer_reviews.text: They large was a little tight across the chest and in the arms and the arms were too short for me. The Xlarge was quite loose but I thought it might work except the neck was so huge there was no way it would work - and I couldn’t get it to fit tighter - it also wasn’t as warm as I thought it would be 5 invites outside and I was back in to change coats - in addition the hood was just completely wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Ashoggan

customer_reviews.title: Good multifunctional jacket.
customer_reviews.text: The two sleeves tend to bunch a little around the wrists which makes it annoying when I have a watch or bracelet on. Other than that it’s great. Was perfect for my recent trip to Canada and kept me toasty while whale watching in 40 degree temps. Love that I can wear separately when needed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kay

customer_reviews.title: Ski Jacket
customer_reviews.text: The liner is very warm and has sleeves that have elastic at the ends. Helps to keep the cold air out and you can put it around your gloves. It is a very warm coat. I like the looks of it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marinah

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she really likes it, but you definitely have to buy a size up or it will NOT fit.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Gehlhoff

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: The jacket fits as expected based off the size chart. It definitely works as a rain jacket. The fleece inside isnt warm enough in it's own so I layer up underneath. Pockets are nice and deep. Hoods are always big on my head so it covers majority of my eyesight but the jacket does what it says and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: ladystars1994

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Iceland weather
customer_reviews.text: Bought this jacket for my Iceland trip. Kept the wind out, water slides off, kept me warm at all times. The inner fleece is very soft and the hoodie is a plus. All pockets have zippers. The inner fleece can be detached from the outer layer. Kept me warm in 3 degrees celcius weather.
customer_reviews.author: ofelia soriano

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy seams, soft feel fleece
customer_reviews.text: A very nicely constructed jacket! I’m still trying to decide if it will be warm enough for skiing, as that’s what I am looking for. It would make a great fall/spring layer, here in Colorado, but winter might get too cold for it some days.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Silver Baring-Gould

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good quality coat. I sent it back because it wasn’t as long as it looked in the picture. It was hard to tell because it wasn’t on a model. If it was the length I wanted it would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zipper
customer_reviews.text: I wore it a couple times and the zipper broke! It's a cheap plastic zipper!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for NY and the Macy's Parade!
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this to wear in NY for the parade to match my son's school colors since they were in the parade. It's held up to the wind and kept me nice and toasty warm! Most of the time I was able to leave it unzipped halfway but it was on par with keeping the wind from making me cold. It also helps that the bottom has a drawstring elastic to close in the bottom from the updrafts when needed. Very nice coat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cold winter and Florida winter jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when we were going to Wisconsin for vacation. It was 9 degrees and this jacket kept me so warm. I live in Florida and did not want to spend a ton of money for a jacket I was only going to use on vacation but I use this all the time in Florida now. I use the rain jacket all the time and the fleece inner layer is the perfect jacket for winter in Florida. So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: N.Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits great one of the best fits I’ve ever had for a thick coat. Kinda hard to test how it holds up in cold weather in this 110 degree Texas weather. I feel like I’m prepared for winter now !! Yes it does run slightly small
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect jacket especially at price.
customer_reviews.text: Near perfect jacket. Does well in cold weather (esp with a sweater), blocks wind, protected from a fairly heavy, but brief exposure to rain. Would order larger size if use a extra layer frequently. Extremely well finished, sewing is neat and no loose threads. Does have a slight noise, but nothing annoying. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: GaRN75

customer_reviews.title: Delightful, but go up a size!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is wonderful, but I listened to the reviews about the sizing. It does run small, I am an 18W, and the 3X is just right, with enough room for warm clothes. Zips up perfectly. I am pretty busty, so I played it safe and went up to be sure there was enough room. The 3X is more like a 2X or even an XL in other brands that run larger. It is well made and glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: hypatiaa

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Best buy I made in a long time. Love the fit and the warmth. I love how I can remove a layer if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Have only tried it on and worn for a few minutes since it's not cold enough to actually wear it but I'm definitely glad I listened to the reviews that said to size up, it definitely runs small
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Ill fitting and noisy
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this jacket would be fitted as it is shown in the main picture, but it is boxy unfortunately. I am a medium and ordered a medium- the sleeves were short and the jacket length was short but otherwise was baggy. Outer jacket is extremely noisy and inner jacket sleeves have very tight elastic.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, workmanship and quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I always buy jackets/coats one size larger than my tops (to leave room for layering). I bought one size larger for this and it fit perfect. Pleased with the quality for the price as well. I have not been able to test it out in the rain yet but from the feel of the fabric, I would believe it will meet the waterproof claims.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Loved the jacket when I first got it but unfortunately the zipper and the zipper strip broke shortly after I got it which is disappointing considering how much I spent on it. I ended up having to go out and buy a new one because I live in wisconsin amd cant go without a jacket in the middle of december. Highly disappointed. Will be contacting to see if I can get a refund. I do not want a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty and arrived fast, but didn't fit me. I usually wear a large/xlarge. This fit me more like a medium. Too tight on my chest area. Maybe an XXlarge may have fit, but I like my coats loose so I can wear sweaters/layers underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Runs REALLY Small
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! I ordered this jacket up one size and it was still too small! The fabric is annoying, noisy and a bit scratchy. The fleece is not the highest quality. Needless to say, I returned this "gem" and found a jacket somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Fit was great! Material seems sturdy and not cheap looking. Love the pocket with the hole for the cord for your phone and headphones. Deep pockets with zippers were perfect for holding my hat, gloves, keys, wallet. Color was spot on according to picture. Kept me pretty warm even without the fleece undercoat. Pretty great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ashes

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking jacket. Great fit. Warm while not being too bulky. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great ski jacket! Love the options, removable liner.
customer_reviews.author: EuroShan

customer_reviews.title: Nice and convenient coat
customer_reviews.text: Good and comfy. I got this for my spouse and she is satisfied with it. It is really neat that you can change this coat depending on the weather conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Christopher Bautista-Anguiano

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: This coat runs small. Size up a size. Other than that it is a nice jacket, very well made. I returned the jacket and reorder the correct size with no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Gohsmsn

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep warm.  Negative 3 star
customer_reviews.text: Does not keep warm and the liner sleeve only hooks on one side so when you place your rm through the sleeve it bunches up. Will not purchase again and will not recommend. Sadly, I'm past the return date so I'm stuck with a useless winter jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Ray0603Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: The coat fits, I took the advice of others and ordered a size up. I wear 18 women's shirts and I got the xxxl, it fits great. Only thing I do not like is the hood. It's a windbreaker material hood. Should be a more sturdy hood. Updated review: I ended up returning this coat. I live in Buffalo and this coat will not be warm enough for a Buffalo winter. Other than that it is a nice coat.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is a great value for the price. It is well made. It is waterproof and windproof with multiple pockets. My husband and I will be skiing in a few weeks and this will be great for that. It is so warm. It is very stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KristaDD

customer_reviews.title: Buy this coat ok!
customer_reviews.text: I got it today. I love it. It came just in time it’s freezing outside! This coat is warm and protects from freezing strong winds! I would recommend. It fits good too. No need to layer because of the fleece
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great peice of gear!
customer_reviews.text: Verh nice jacket. Water resistant (not water proof), and being able to zip out the fleece jacket inside makes this a perfect 3 season coat. I love that it fits my 44dd chest perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Woman Hiking

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this jacket/fleece is as expected for the price, but considering you get two separate pieces its a great bargain. I read previous reviews regarding fit and ordered a M (normally wear a S). I think I could have gone either way and been happy, but the M does allow for layering underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D Kopec

customer_reviews.title: Excited about this jacket
customer_reviews.text: In love with the jacket. Great quality! Very well thawed. Bright sharp color. Good quality zippers. Really like the idea of 3 in one. Can wear it as a zipped sweater or as a plain jacket. Or together for warm. Windproof and waterproof. Attached hood. Plenty of pockets. Long enough. True to size. I ordered XXL. My regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Volha

customer_reviews.title: Fits a little snug
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and very warm. Just fits on the smaller side. Ordered a size up but fits tight across the shoulders and hips. The hood is pretty pointless. Only zipped on for about 4 inches so a lot of wind and snow go down the back of your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It warm and the inner jacket is great too
customer_reviews.text: At first I was going to return due to color but I decided not to you see the jacket is so well made that I feared not getting another in time love my jacket and the color too I have gotten so many compliments as for warm, for a jacket, it is surprisingly warm thank you
customer_reviews.author: No  name

customer_reviews.title: Just received but very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect! Not too big not too small. Feels warm but is light weight. Very happy with purchase! Now just to try it out in the snow/cold. Update: Used it in blizzard weather. Very happy with purchase! Great price and great jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very crunchy sounding and cheap feeling. You get what you pay for, I guess. It’s very thin. The only thing I liked was that the cinching was only in the back, which looks very flattering. I’m returning it though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run small!!
customer_reviews.text: While it looks like a nice quality jacket and coat, it is too small. I;m in between a M and a L, so I bought a L in this, but it's too small. US sizes are larger, buy a size up. Bummer cause now I gotta go to all the trouble to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnie B

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket worn separately
customer_reviews.text: I live in Utah. I purchased this jacket to hike in the winter in the backcountry. The shell is water resistant and the fleece lining I usually wear separately which I find warm enough in 30 F On the slim side
customer_reviews.author: Kozette

customer_reviews.title: Fitted ski jacket
customer_reviews.text: I really like the jacket. I ordered a Large after reviewing the fitting chart. It fits snug and I will wear it but it leaves no room for layering clothes underneath. Just so other are aware. Possibly order a size larger than you normally would. It's a beautiful jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Keller

customer_reviews.title: Lovely color
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this jacket for my daughter. She loves the color, and was excited to see that it can be worn three ways, with the liner being removable - as its own jacket.
customer_reviews.author: mrsg94

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, not short at all. Good amount of space in the arms
customer_reviews.text: It fits to the T. I love the versatility of this product and had been searching for a good jacket like this. We’re supposed to get our first cold front this weekend (I’m in Texas) and I can’t wait to wear it!
customer_reviews.author: Flor 💐

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok so it fit really good when all the pieces of the jacket or not is up together I want it’s always up together in one sec jacket it runs on the smaller side
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Flattering and very warm
customer_reviews.text: This coat is beautiful. I ordered the pinkish color, which has maroon silouette-ing to make it more flattering. I ordered the XL and I’m 5’6 and 175 with an hourglass figure. It has room for two tight layers and a chunky sweater underneath. It didnt look bulky and it felt kinda of light weight, but it held up well in 3 degree weather with a windchill of -12, with three layers underneath.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Walker

customer_reviews.title: If only I could get in and out of it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, color, weight, warmth (Buffalo 26 degrees today) and comfort of this jacket BUT and this is a big BUT......The zipper is awful. I get trapped in it, no smooth entrance or exit and it gets embarrassing. All they need to to replace the zipper and it would be the best!
customer_reviews.author: Regina E.

customer_reviews.title: Size up at least 2 sizes.
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely not true to size. You need to go up at least 2 sizes and its not long as what i was looking for. But It is warm and holds up well in extreme cold.
customer_reviews.author: Lynell Averett

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is a good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a recent trip to Europe & it was all I needed. The fleece was warm and looked nice on it's own, the outer layer was perfect for wind & light rain and the two together were great when needed. The outer shell has velcro wrist that are great, I have very thin wrist & it was nice to be able to adjust them to fit me snugly.
customer_reviews.author: therese renehan

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Really nice jacket but runs really small. I ordered a size larger and it was still too small to wear a sweater under it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Henchel

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an XL, but I got a 2X in this coat. Glad I did. I like to wear layer shirts, and this coat is perfect for that. Its very warm and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: It’s definitely warm enough
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this jacket would be warm enough for my ski trip. It is definitely warm enough, definitely water proof. I only wore a thin long sleeve shirt under this jacket and I was burning up. This jacket did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and very comfortable jacket
customer_reviews.text: Got this just before our Alaska trip; it was a comfortable fit. Good product; together as well as as while using the two jackets separately.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Get size up
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6 130lbs I got a medium I’m usually a small It fits perfect but if you are someone who likes layers definitely get a size or two up
customer_reviews.author: JaidaT415

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fit and design!
customer_reviews.text: This coat is so comfortable and fit so nice. The inner pinning is so soft and warm on those chilly fall days and the outer shell is so good in those windy days for blocking the wind out!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jallad

customer_reviews.title: No satin lining on inside sleeve
customer_reviews.text: The inside sleeves are NOT satin lined. So don't expect to comfortably put on over anything other than a tank top. This is a Huge problem since I expected to wear this over any tshirt, long sleeved shirt or sweater. I should have just bought a North Face jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Fits right but looks like plastic junk
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected but it looks like cheap junk. I spent too much for this for it to look like plastic.
customer_reviews.author: tre.a

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it appears.
customer_reviews.text: The jacket looks nice. The liner is made of a cheap fleece, not as soft as I hoped. The outer jacket is weatherproof which is good but the material is not comfortable. The outer jacket is also made of a stiff and noisy material. I’m afraid I’ve given this coat to goodwill and wasted $70.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It fits fine. However, when I wear it I sound like a trash bag. Every movement can be heard! The outside material feels cheap...
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin

customer_reviews.title: Sized much too small. Good features though.
customer_reviews.text: This coat appears well made and has many good features, but it is very small for it's size. For a 3x it's not even as large as a 2x.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Best cold weather jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this jacket ❤ fits perfectly, it is warm, all pockets are great quality. Living in Wyoming it can truly get bitter cold outside so I needed something warm and on the cute side and in this jacket I got both. Thank you so much and I will be getting one for our daughter in Colorado 😊
customer_reviews.author: april bocek

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: First “real” coat that I have owned in ages. Very warm and I have worn it in many configurations. I just wish the color was a little nicer shade of pink.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy mom

customer_reviews.title: Runs smaller then expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger because it stated it ran small and it was still to small. Very disappointed because I really liked the jacket !
customer_reviews.author: Diane Allen

customer_reviews.title: Best Jacket I own
customer_reviews.text: What can I say except I love this jacket! money well spent. Its kept me warm in single digit weather. I love the fact that you can remove the inner lining. Perfect for inside when its still chilly but too warm for both. will buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great coat
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is a fleece or rain coat or both together. Love this coat. I got the purple, eggplant color. It gives plenty of ways to tighten or loosen areas such as around your face, waist, wrist. I live in New York state and the coat almost keeps me too warm if the temp is above 30*.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Quality jacket
customer_reviews.text: If you take a medium the opt for the large as the jacket runs a little small. Otherwise a very nice jacket.
customer_reviews.author: skip haley

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! It's perfect for what I need. I get some static shocks though, but it's an amazing, comfortable and beautiful jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Thais Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Very light and durable
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size.Great during the rainy weather conditions because it kept my daughter comfortable.Repels the water. The jacket is light and durable.
customer_reviews.author: SFPT
